forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun during the morning will give way to cloudy skies this afternoon. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this morning, then becoming cloudy during the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies this evening will become partly cloudy after midnight. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with some clearing expected late. Low 39F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 17C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 63F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with a few showers later at night. Low 46F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 53F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thunderstorms likely. High 59F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 8C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 47F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 11C. Winds W at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds W at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low near 5C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 41F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low near 40F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.
